outputs.output_descr:
The Elaboration of a Startegy for the Reduction of carbon Emissions in Trinidad and Tobago project seeks to provide development support to the Ministry of Housing and the Environment in the elaboration of a carbon reduction policy, strategy and implementation framework through technical analysis, capacity development and knowledge sharing over a 3 year period.

The main outputs of the project include:
1) The strengthening of legislative and policy institutional framework for CO2 reduction.
2) The development of clear strategic elements and policies identified for reducing CO2 emissions from the identified target sectors.
30 The development of a framework for strategy implementation.

project_descr: The Strategy for the Reduction of Carbon Emissions in Trinidad and Tobago
project_title: Strategy for the Reduction of Carbon Emissions in T&T
